scripts.pre-dist-yarn: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if ('$npm_execpath'.indexOf('yarn.js') !== -1) { const cp=require('child_process'); const stdout=cp.execSync('yarn licenses generate-disclaimer', {env: { ...process.env, NODE_ENV: 'production'}, encoding: 'utf8'}); fs.writeFileSync('dist-prod/LICENSES.txt', stdout); } "
scripts.update-version: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); require('shelljs').sed('-i', /Coordinate converter: v<span>([.\d]+)<\/span>/, 'Coordinate converter: v<span>' + pkg.version + '<\/span>', './index.html');"
scripts.build-release: $npm_execpath run update-version && $npm_execpath run clean && $npm_execpath run build -- --config=vite.config.prod.js && $npm_execpath run pre-dist && $npm_execpath run tar-release && $npm_execpath run zip-release
scripts.tar-release: node -e "require('shelljs'); require('tar').c({gzip: true, sync: true, C: 'dist-prod', file: '${npm_package_name}-release-v${npm_package_version}.tgz'},['.'])"
